code: export var supportsPersistence=function supportsPersistence(){try{localStorage.setItem("test","test");localStorage.removeItem("test");return true;}catch(exception){return false;}};export var persistCurrentState=function persistCurrentState(currentState,saveables){if(!supportsPersistence())return;var saveableState=saveables.reduce(function(acc,saveable){acc[saveable.toString()]=currentState[saveable.toString()];return acc;},{});var serializedState=JSON.stringify(saveableState);localStorage.setItem("state",serializedState);};export var loadPersistedState=function loadPersistedState(){if(!supportsPersistence())return{};var serializedState=localStorage.getItem("state");if(serializedState)return JSON.parse(serializedState);};
